Description: Papyrus written with black ink with demotic text: 17 ll. on recto (vertical fibres) and 5 ll. on verso (horizontal fibres). Account of four dreams. Thompson's MS Catalogue: "a short statement of four dreams or visions (cf. no. 10237-8). Date. Late Ptolemaic? Origin. Memphis?".
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Memphis (Egypt) ((site suggested by Thompson's MS Catalogue))
Curator's comments: To be published by J Ray (Studia Demotica). Being studied by Luigi Prada (Oxford): publication rights assigned to him 30.5.06. Previously assigned to J. Ray?
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (381205) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/381205)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus Black ink Inlaid: brown paper Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: leather Object Priority: B Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: good
